name: Solitary Sorcerer
description:
A simple action arcade roguelike where you play as a wizard with an enormous laser beam. Fighting off hoards of enemies in his never ending quest to be alone.

!!! If you experience a lot of lag staying in places you have already been reduces it a lot!!!

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 with the theme you're not alone. In this game you play as a wizard that wished he was alone but isn't. But to be honest I focused more on juice than the theme.

If you like this game consider following my as I plan to make more games.
